$$.value: The weakest monster in MapleStory is the BLUE SNAIL.
The weakest monster is the GREEN SNAIL. (LV. 1)
The most powerful monster in MapleStory is the JR. BALROG.
Currently the most powerful monster is the CRIMSON BALROG.
RED SNAILS can only be found at the Maple Island, where the beginners play.
There's quite a lot of them at Victoria Island, too.
You'll occasionaly obtain [Pig Tail] after defeating the PIG.
You'll occasionally obtain [Pig Head].
You'll obtain [Blue Ribbon] by defeating the RIBBONED PIG.
You'll obtain [Red Ribbon].
The weakest among the mushrooms is the ORANGE MUSHROOM.
The weakest among the mushrooms is the SPORE. (LV. 2)
You'll obtain [Lupin's Doll] by defeating the cute monkey monster called LUPIN.
You'll obtain Lupin's Doll, banana, and others.
DRAKE is a monster that lives deep in the Dungeon. You'll occasionally obtain [Drake's Toenail] by defeating it.
You'll obtain [Drake's Skin].
When you defeat the PIG, WILD BOAR, or the HORNED MUSHROOM, you'll obtain [leather].
HORNED MUSHROOM does not provide [leather].
The slimes you'll see often at the beginner's map or around Ellinia are the BLUE SLIMES.
At the beginner's map, you'll see the GREEN SLIMES.
The GREEN MUSHROOM that you'll see often around the field, forrest, or the construction site has a grey horn on its cap.
GREEN MUSHROOMS do not have horns.
The WILD CARGO that lives deep in the Dungeon is very adept at attacking both up-close and long-range.
WILD CARGO only attacks up-close.
EVIL EYE, CURSE EYE, and COLD EYE all look similar, but only EVIL EYE has two eyes.
They all have one eye.
The LIGATORS that live around the swamps look a lot like spiders.
They resemble alligators.
The WILD CARGO that live deep in the Dungeon is the mutant version of a cat with a single horn at the center of its head.
WILD CARGO has 2 huge horns.
The JR. BALROG that lives in the cursed altar is a LV. 80 monster.
JR. BALROG is a LV. 80 monster.
The fastest monster in MapleStory is the STONE GOLLEM.
STONE GOLLEM and DARK STONE GOLLEM is considered the slowest monsters in the game.
The nasty ZOMBIE LUPIN's are made of black magic and the cursed doll through Grendel the Really Old.
It's a monster made out of Grendel the Really Old's black magic.
MUSHMOM, a humongous mushroom monster, is basically a giant version of the ORANGE MUSHROOM.
MUSHMOM is a giant version of the ORANGE MUSHROOM.
BUBBLINGS that reside in subways attack by firing bubbles from long range.
BUBBLINGS only attack up-close.
STIRGE, a flying monster, usually flies around for a long time, and then takes a break by hanging on the ceiling.
They never stop flying.
You'll obtain [Jr. Necki's Skin] by defeating the JR. NECKI, and when eaten, you'll recover some of your MP.
[Jr. Necki's Skin] is not edible.
JR. WRAITH, a monster that resembles ghost, occasionally offers a [Blue Tablecloth].
They only offer [White Tablecloth].
LORANG, a crab-resembling monster around Florina Beach, occasionally attacks while jumping.
They do resemble crabs, but they do attack while jumping, too.
LORANG, a crab-resembling monster, digs the sand and hides in there if they are near death.
They'll fight til they die. (Bravo...)
UMTI, the monster that resembles a sea turtle, usually attacks long-range with force.
UMTI's attack long-range.
[Iron Hog's Metal Hoof] is obtainable through IRON HOG, a metal armor-dressed monster that resembles a horse.
IRON HOG is a pig.
[Medicine with Weird Vibes], an item given by Wraith, will make you really feel weird if consumed.
[Medicine with Weird Vibes] cannot be consumed.
MALADY, a monster that flies around with the broom, fires away laser beams from far out.
MALADY only attacks up-close.
RED DRAKE is the only Drake that attacks long-range.
RED DRAKE attacks long-range with force.
CROKO, which lives around swamps, is higher leveled than COPPER DRAKE.
CROKO is LV. 52, and COPPER DRAKE is LV. 45.
COPPER DRAKE can be found near Perion, and is known for attacking from long-range.
It only attacks from up-close.
Every monster from El Nath is weak against fire-based attacks.
DARK YETI and DARK PEPE are weak against religious attacks.
JR. YETI and the Transforming JR. YETI have the same level and HP.
They are both LV. 50 with HP 3700.
CRIMSON BALROG, LV 100, does not get poisoned from posion-based attacks.
It cancels out poison-based attacks, but is vulnerable against religious attacks.
MALADY, the monster flying around in broom, is an undead monster.
It's weak against religious attacks, but is NOT an undead monster.
The monsters that offer [Stiff Feather] are HECTOR, DARK YETI, and LYCANTHROPE.
HECTOR, DARK YETI, and LYCANTHROPE offer [Stiff Feather].
The monsters that offer [Soft Feather] are YETI, JR. YETI, WHITE FANG, LYCANTHROPE, AND LUPIN.
LUPIN offers [Stiff Feather].
AXE STUMP is a monster borne of rage towards a lumberjack that forgot to take off the axe from the tree.
There's a legend where AXE STUMP is a monster borne of rage towards a lumberjack that forgot to take off the axe from the tree.
WEREWOLF summons its other self to attack.
WEREWOLF does not have its other self.
NEPENDEATH and DARK NEPENDEATH are the only monsters that do not move around.
NEPENDEATH does not move around and attack.
아랫마을에 등장하는 왕도깨비 중 파란왕도깨비는 돼지고기산적을 이용해서 소환할 수 있다.
파란왕 도깨비 - 곡차
아랫마을에 등장하는 왕도깨비 중 노란왕도깨비는 곡차를 이용해서 소환할 수 있다.
노란왕 도깨비 - 돼지고기산적
메이플스토리 내에서 가장 약한 몬스터는 '스포아'이다.
스포아가 아니라 달팽이가 가장 약한 몬스터이다.
동물의 숲에 있는 여우와 너구리는 이마에 나뭇잎을 붙이고 있다.
두 몬스터 모두 이마에 나뭇잎을 붙이고 있다.
중국 상해 교외에 있는 오리를 잡으면 오리발을 획득할 수 있다.
오리발이 아닌 오리알을 획득할 수 있다.
중국 상해 교외에 있는 양을 잡으면 양털을 획득할 수 있다.
양을 잡으면 양털을 얻을 수 있다.
중국 상해 교외에 있는 닭들은 모두 수탉이다.
모두 벼슬이 달려 있는 수탉이다.
중국 서주갈림길에 있는 염소를 잡으면 염소 수염을 획득할 수 있다.
염소를 잡으면 하얀뿔을 획득할 수 있다.
대만 서문정Ⅳ에서 광대원숭이가 돌리고 있는 공은 녹색, 파랑색, 노란색이다.
광대원숭이가 돌리는 공은 녹색, 파랑색, 빨간색이다.
You'll need 15 tree branches to make 1 Processed Wood.
10 tree branches is enough.
You'll make a set of screws, 15 screws in total, with a Bronze Plate and a Steel Plate.
Screws are useful for making or upgrading items.
Fusion Mace, a one-handed blunt weapon, is only available to Warriors and Magicians.
It's only available to Warriors and Magicians.
Mace, a one-handed blunt weapon, is only available to Warriors and Magicians.
Mace is only available to Warriors and Magicians.
Long Sword, a one-handed sword, is available to everyone BUT the beginners.
Beginners can use it, too.
Balanche, a weapon for Bowman sold at Henesys, has an item option of STR + 2 attached to it.
Balanche has an item option of STR + 1 attached to it.
The One-side Only Earring is available through stores, but NOT the Amethyst Earring.
Amethyst Earring can be purchased at the Henesys Department Store.
The Blue Whitebottom Shoes that can be worn from LV. 26 on, is available to everyone, including the beginners.
It is available to everyone.
The Armor Scroll consists of two types - the one for DEF, and the one for HP.
You can check through the Perion Department Store.
When purchasing a 100% scroll at the store, the scroll for two-handed weapon is more expensive than the one for one-handed weapon.
The price for the scrolls for both the two-handed or one-handed weapon are the same.
The weapon store at Ellinia only sells scrolls for Staff and Wand.
The scrolls for earrings are also available.
The weapon store at Lith Harbor is the only place without the Subi Throwing-Star.
The Subi Throwing-Star is also available at Lith Harbor.
The Stolen Fence is only available at Lith Harbor.
The Square Wooden Shield is available at Lith Harbor.
The item options for the White & Black Korean Rubber Shoes are diferent.
The colors are different, but the options are the same.
If you use the 100% Scroll for Claw for ATT, then the ATT will be +1, as will be the accuracy.
Only the ATT goes up by 1. The accuracy stays the same.
A single item slot can hold upto 100 ores of same kind at once.
The ores can be stored up to 100 per slot.
The item that's dropped onto the field will not disappear, even after a long period of time.
It disappears after a certain amount of time.
To make the Mithril Tower Shield, you'll need Steel Tower Shield, 10 Mithril Plates, and 50,000 mesos.
Not 50,000 mesos, but 100,000 mesos.
To make the Moon Rock, you'll need to take the a Plate of Mithril, Steel, Bronze, Adamantium, Silver, Orihalcon, and Gold each at Arwen the Fairy.
You also need 10,000 mesos along with the items.
To make the Mithril Brist, you'll need Steel Brist, 5 Mithril Plates, and 55,000 mesos.
Mr. Smith of Perion makes it.
Steel Pride, a hat for Magicians, has the item option of INT + 1 and LUK + 1
Only INT + 1 is available.
To make Steel Trigger, which can be worn at LV. 30 for Warriors, you'll need 30 pieces of Drake's Skin.
It'll take 30 leathers and 20 pieces of Drake's Skin.
Green Jack Boots, which is available for Bowman over LV. 25, has the item option of DEX + 2
An option of DEX + 1 is attached to it.
Blue White-Lined Boots, which is available for thieves over LV. 35, has the item option of LUK + 1 and DEX + 1.
It's available through Chrishrama of Sleepywood.
To make Metal Koif, a helmet for Warriors, you'll need a Bronze Koif, a Steel Plate, and 500 mesos.
Mr. Thunder of Perion makes it.
To make Green Diros, a glove for Bowman, you'll need Red Diros as one of the materials.
Not Red Diros, but Blue Diros.
To make the Basic Archer Glove, you'll need 20 leathers.
To make the Basic Archer Glove, you'll need 15 leathers.
To make Work Glove, a glove for thieves, you'll need 20 leathers and 1,000 mesos.
You need 15 leathers and 1,000 mesos.
To make Dark Wolfskin, a Thief glove, you'll need Steel Wolfskin as one of the materials.
Not Steel Wolfskin, but Bronze Wolfskin.
To make Steel Titans, a claw for thieves, you'll need 5 screws as one of the materials.
JM from tha Streetz of Kerning City makes it.
To make Steel Igor, a claw for thieves, you'll need Bronze Igor, 2 Steel Plates, and 3,000 mesos.
JM from tha Streetz of Kerning City makes it.
To make Red Lutia, a glove for Magicians, you'll need 60 leathers.
Francois of Ellinia makes it.
Dark Arten, a glove for Magicians, has the item option of INT + 2 and LUK + 1.
The only option attached to it is INT + 3.
The level limit for Juno, a glove for Warriors, is 15.
The level limit is 10.
To make Yellow Briggon, a glove for Warriors, you'll need 2 Topaz's.
Not 2, but 3 Topaz's
All weapons that can be used by everyone are only limited by levels, not stats.
There are weapons that are affected by the stats.
To make Bronze Husk, a glove for Warriors, you'll need 2 Power Crystals as one of the materials.
An option of STR + 2 is attached to it.
Snowshoes, which enables you not to slip through snow, is available to everyone with the level limit of 30.
The boots differ from different jobs.
To make a crossbow called Rower, you'll need 45 screws.
You need 40 screws.
The most expensive one to refine is the Star Rock.
The most expensive one to refine is Dark Crystal, which will cost you 50,000 mesos.
At the Repair Shop, you'll be able to acquire a Steel Plate with 100 pieces of Iron Hog's Metal Hoof and 1,000 mesos.
The Repair Shop is at Kerning City.
The Bronze Arrows and Steel Arrows are available through Vicious of Henesys.
Vicious only makes Bronze Arrows.
You get 5 mesos for selling one Mushroom Spore.
You get 3 mesos for selling one Mushroom Spore.
Slime Bubble costs more than the Squishy Liquid.
Slime Bubble DOES cost more than the Squishy Liquid.
You get 100 mesos for selling 1 ore of Bronze.
You get 100 mesos for selling 1 ore of Bronze.
Drake's Skull from Red Drake costs more than the Drake's Skull of other Drakes.
They all cost the same.
To refine one Black Crystal, it'll cost you 3,000 mesos.
It costs 3,000 mesos to refine a black crystal.
You get 8 mesos for selling one Orange Mushroom Cap.
You get 4 mesos for selling one Orange Mushroom Cap.
You get 50 mesos for selling 10 tree branches.
You get 4 mesos for selling 1 tree branch.
You get 300 mesos for selling 3 leathers.
You get 100 mesos for selling 1 leather.
The price of 10 ores of Gold and one Gold Plate is of same price.
You'll get 3,000 mesos for selling 10 ores of Gold, 1,200 mesos for a Gold Plate.
The most expensive Return Scroll is the one to Sleepywood.
The Return Scroll : Sleepywood costs 600 mesos.
Sell 5 of Malady's Experiemental Frogs, buy Arrows for Bow, sell them back to the store, and you'll get 300 mesos.
You don't get anything for selling arrows at the store. Doesn't that blow?
To purchase [Old Wisconsin], you'll need 3,000 mesos.
[Old Wisconsin] is available through the weapon store at Henesys.
If you purchase Arrow for Bow at the store, it'll cost you 1 meso per arrow, but you won't be able to sell the arrows for any money.
Arrow for Bow and Crossbow will not get you any money for selling them at the store.
The Watermelon at MapleStory costs 3,100 mesos.
It costs 3,200 mesos.
The Red Bean Sundae at MapleStory costs 4,000 mesos.
You can buy it from an NPC for 4,000 mesos.
The Ice Cream Suckers at MapleStory costs 2,100 mesos.
It costs 2,300 mesos.
The price of 150 Huge Bubbles of Bubbling is LOWER than 200 Slime Bubbles.
200 Slime Bubbles : 10,000 mesos. 150 Huge Bubbles of Bubbling : 1,500 mesos.
The price of Jr. Neck Skin and Stirge Wing is the same.
They both go for 12 mesos.
The price of 2 Jr. Necki skins is LOWER than 1 Ligator skin.
2 Jr. Neck Skins = 24 mesos. 1 Ligator Skin = 25 mesos.
Sell 10 Tablecloths from Jr. Wraith, and you'll be able to buy a Lemon with it.
Lemon costs 305 mesos, so you'll be short of 5 mesos.
1 Lorang Claw has the same price as 1 Cold Eye Tail.
Lorang Claw = 32 mesos. Cold Eye Tail = 35 mesos.
1 Clang Claw has the same price as the price of 5 Blue Mushroom Caps.
Clang Claw = 60 mesos. Blue Mushroom Cap = 12.
The price of Umti Shell and Slime Bubble is the same.
They both go for 50 mesos.
If you sell 100 pieces of Iron Hog's Metal Hoof, you'll be able to buy a Dark Moon Conehat.
100 pieces of Iron Hog's Metal Hoof = 3,800 mesos. Yes, you can buy Dark Moon Conehat with that.
The Medicine with Weird Vibes from Wraith will go for the same price as 1 Processed Wood.
Medicine with Weird Vibes = 50 mesos. Processed Wood = 20 mesos.
The price of 128 pieces of Croko Skin is 6,500 mesos.
If you sell 10 Pig Ribbons to the store, you can buy a Red Potion with those mesos.
10 Pig Ribbons = 50 mesos.
A Mushmom Spore has the same price as a Tauromacis Horn.
They both go for 100 mesos.
If you sell the Star Rock at the store, you'll get 10,000 mesos per.
You'll get 10,000 mesos per Star Rock.
If you sell 2 Red Snail Shells, 2 Pig Heads, and 1 Slime Bubble at the store, you'll get 140 mesos.
You'll get 30+60+50=140 mesos.
Both the Yellow Umbrella and the Sky-Blue Umbrella will get you 1 meso if you sell them at the stores.
1 meso for Sky-Blue Umbrella, but 50,000 mesos for Yellow Umbrella.
It costs the same whereever in MapleStory to refine the ores.
It's a little bit cheaper at Kerning City.
If you sell your screws at the store, it'll fetch you 100 mesos per screw.
It goes fo 50 mesos.
일본 뇌염 백신은 꼭 여름철에 맞아야 한다
일본 뇌염 백신은 여름철에만 맞는 것이 아니다.
거북선을 만들어 왜적을 물리친 이순신 장군의 호는 '충무공'이다.
이순신 장군의 호는 충무공이다.
의식주란 사람들이 살아가는데 꼭 필요한 옷, 음식, 놀이를 일컫는 말이다.
의식주란 옷, 음식, 집을 뜻한다.
공기를 가열하면 공기의 부피가 줄어든다.
공기를 가열하면 공기의 부피가 늘어난다. 공기의 부피는 온도에 따라 달라진다.
색의 3요소 중 '명도'란 색이 맑고 탁한 정도를 말한다.
색의 밝고 어두운 정도를 명도라하고 맑고 탁한 정도는 채도라 한다.
피를 빨아먹는 모기는 숫놈이다.
피를 빨아먹는 모기는 암놈이고, 수놈은 식물의 진(수액)을 먹는 것이 보통이다.
한국의 장외주식거래시장을 코스닥이라한다. 그리고 미국의 장외주식거래시장은 미스닥이라고 한다.
미국의 장외주식거래 시장은 나스닥이라 한다.
산 위에서는 기압이 낮기 때문에  평지보다 훨씬 높은 온도에서 물이 끓게 된다.
산정상에서는 낮은 온도에서 물이 끓기 때문에 밥을 지으면 설익게 된다.
[까투리]는 다 자란 수탉을 의미한다.
까투리는 암컷꿩을 의미한다. 수컷꿩은 장끼라 부른다.
경부고속도로는 우리나라에서 제일 처음 건설된 고속도로이다.
우리나라에서 최초로 건설된 고속도로는 경인고속도로이다.
추석은 중추절, 설날과 함께 우리나라 3대 명절중의 하나이다.
추석의 다른 이름이 중추절이다. 3대 명절은 단오,설,추석이다.
1876년 황해도 해주에서 태어나 독립운동가로 생을 마감하신 김구 선생님의 호는 '백의'이다.
김구선생님의 호는 '백범'이다.
우리나라 동쪽 끝에 있는 섬은 독도이다. 독도의 행정구역은 강원도이다.
독도의 행정소재지는 경상북도이다.
우리나라에서 최초의 노벨상 수상자는 김대중 전대통령이고 시상부분은 경제학상이다.
김대중 전대통령은 노벨 평화상을 수상하였다.
바다에 사는 새우는 다른 어패류와는 달리 뇌가 꼬리에 달려 있다.
새우의 뇌는 머리에 달려 있다.
홍차의 종류중 '실론티'라는 것이 있다. 이때 실론은 홍차가 많이 나는 인도의 한 마을 이름이다.
실론은 스리랑카의 지명이다
에베레스트산 최고령 등반가인 일본의 미우라 유이치로 씨는 혹독한 추위를 초밥을 먹으면서 극복했다고 한다.
김치찌개를 먹으며 추위를 극복했다고 전해진다.
태극기의 4괘 [건곤감리] 중 여름을 뜻하는 괘는 [건]이다.
여름(夏)을 뜻하는 괘는 [곤] 이다. 건은 봄(春)을 의미한다.
여름에 피는 대표적인 꽃에는 해바라기,목련,나팔꽃이 있다.
봄의화신 목련이라 불린다
하마의 땀은 붉은색이다
하마의 땀샘에서는 붉은색을 띠는 끈끈한 분비물을 내기 때문이다
땀이 눈물보다 더 짜다.
눈물이 더 짜다.땀은 99%가 물이고 눈물 성분은 98%가 물이다
모기에게 물렸을 때 가려움증을 느끼는 이유는 <칸디다균> 때문이다.
모기에게 물렸을 때 가려움증을 느끼는 이유는 <히스타민균> 때문이다
흰돌과 검은돌로 승부를 겨루는 바둑은 바둑판에서 행하여 진다. 이때 바둑판의 교점의 수는 361개 이다.
입하는 태양의 황경이 45°에 있을 때이다.
태양의 황경이 45°에 이르면 여름이 다가오며, 이 절기를 입하(立夏)라 한다.
한국 최초의 공인 수영장은 1936년 7월에 개설된 서울운동장(현 동대문운동장) 수영장 이다.
축구장(26년), 테니스장(34년), 수영장(36년), 야구장(59년)이 있따라 개설 되었다.
고혈압은 여름보다 겨울에 많이 발생한다.
추운날씨로 혈관이 수축되어 압력이 높아지기 때문.
미국의 대표적 주가지수는 '다우존스지수'이다.
다우존스사에서 매일 발표하는 4종류의 주가 평균을 구해 공표한다
영국이 아편전쟁의 승리로 소유하게된 홍콩을 중국에 반환한 해는 1997년이다.
1997년 7월 1일 155년의 식민통치를 끝내고 중국에 반환되었다.
아이스크림은 중국에서 처음 만들어졌다.
5세기 중국에서 황제의 디저트로 빙과가 처음으로 만들어졌다.
